sources.title: Electric Slide | FULL MOVIE | True Crime Story
sources.description:
Based on a true story. Jim Sturgess ("Across the Universe") stars as Eddie Dodson, aka the New York Yankees Bandit, a furniture salesman turned cult hero who robbed more than 60 bank using good looks and charm in the 1980s. With Constance Wu and Patricia Arquette.

#drama #heist #truecrime crime #robbery #movie #basedonatruestory #truestory #crime #bandit #bank #bankrobbery #realcrimestory #1980s #yankees #yankee

metadata.Plot: It's 1983 Los Angeles - beautiful girls, luxurious mansions, glamorous parties and Eddie Dodson, a very hip, very charismatic dealer of high-end antique furniture for the rich and famous. When Eddie meets the cool and aloof Pauline, the attraction is instant and the two live out each other's fast-paced fantasies. That is until Eddie's high-rolling life catches up with him and loan sharks start knocking on his door. To pay off his debts, Eddie and Pauline begin a spree of bank robberies across LA, charming tellers at over 60 banks to hand over the cash. Now the lovers are not only on the run from loan sharks but also have the police hot on their trail.
